Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. 

Shuttle buses have been requested from Forest Park to UIC- Halsted to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/49th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 51st, Union, 49th AND Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/49th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 51st, Union, 49th AND Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/49th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
